title: G.A eSports is Looking for Dedicated players in the Bronze - Gold Tiers to fill in our ranks
body:
> **Disclaimer: Please understand that we're taking in people from Bronze 1 to Gold 4 (Gold 3 - 1, can be accepted but only if the player agrees with the rules and terms) due to the fact that players in the Higher Rank community can be more toxic to lower tiers, even though we have to deal with our own or smurfs down talking. No, we will also not take in any smurfs and if caught and/or found out you're smurfing to be on the team, you will be removed from the team and our discord server (This will be mentioned in the rules as well), unless you wanna be considered to be a coach to your respected team.** > 

Hey ladies and gents, I'm the Team Owner/Founder of Gankers Anonymous and currently we're looking for players to fill our ranks for Team Zodiac (Team 1) and Team Obsidian (Team 2). As of now we're participating in Battlefy Tournaments to see where our teams go and determine whether or not we should be seeking higher tournaments and payed or to keep using free tournaments and build up our trust, respect and our skills as team. We're a handful of dedicated players willing to go above and beyond our expectations to get known throughout the community, despite dynamic queues cause you know sh** happens.

Rules before joining and trying out the team.
As being part of the team you must understand and follow these rules as not following them will refrain you from being on the team.
 
{{summoner:14}} 1: No BMing, trashtalking or flaming in game chat (Despite the enemy team being scumbags, be humble).
{{summoner:1}}  2: When criticizing team players, be assertive and be firm with their weaknesses and suggest ideas to improve them. Otherwise you're just trashtalking them down.
{{summoner:31}}  3: Cheating, using scripts, botting, etc.
{{summoner:3}} 4: Refuse to show improvement and/or not cooperating with any team member from both Zodiac and Obsidian while in any match.
{{summoner:7}} 5: Drama in game, club and discord chat.
{{summoner:2}} 6: Smurfing.
{{summoner:4}} 7: Team Hopping (You're dedicated to one team, either G.A Obsidian or Zodiac)

Our Organization is made of two teams as mentioned in Gankers Anonymous.

* Group Alpha

GA Zodiac (GA-ZDC) - (Team 1)
GA Obsidian (GA-OBS) - (Team 2)

* Group Beta

GA Onslaught (GA-ONG) - (Team 3)
GA ??? (TBA as a 4th team will be decided if needed)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

* GA Zodiac

Coach - OPEN (Gold 1 or higher)

Team Captain - Autaustic Panda
 - ADC - Team Captain
 - Jungle - OPEN
 - Top - OPEN
 - Mid - Dropnadoos
 - Support - StarKillerNico

* GA Obsidian (CLOSED, all but a coach)

Coach - OPEN (Gold 1 or higher)

Team Captain - LOWK3Y
 - ADC - Team Captain
 - Jungle - Ballistixmonkey
 - Top - Dawson213
 - Mid - Kosky
 - Support - NanflasTed

* GA Onslaught

Coach - OPEN (Gold 1 or Higher)

Team Captain - OPEN
- ADC - OPEN
- Jungle - OPEN
- Top - OPEN
- Mid - OPEN
- Support - OPEN

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you're interested please contact me or comment here and we will reply (Myself or the Team Captains)

replies.body: Hey, I'm interested. I'm a jungle main. Some reason I already have d0nuts added on league so that's how I found yall.
We got a new team open... let me know.

IGN- Mewyn 
Jungle and Support Main Looking  very interested <3 I hope you respond :D

if its cool id like to try for mid. I can be sub if yall comfortable with your current mid. 
IGN: CrescentRider
IGN: HighScent Gold 2 If possible can I get to tryout adc?

If you're not taking in players in high elo, I have been looking into becoming a coach (I've been looking around for a solid high silver/low gold team). I am Plat 5 in solo Que, and I'm not sure if Team Captain and Coach are the same thing.

> [{quoted}](name=The Giratina,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=5ZXhho9V,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-07-24T18:49:00.243+0000)

Alright, no problem if you're on Ill add you.

>
> Alright, no problem if you're on Ill add you.

I did add you on the league client by the way

Hi. I'm a SIlver 1 Mid main. I see that your teams don't have a mid role open, but if you're willing to form another team, i'd def be interested 

Also, no one wants to be a sub. They look for teams cause they want to play, not wait to play (imo)

> [{quoted}](name=QuanticPsyche,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=5ZXhho9V,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-07-24T20:23:56.245+0000)
>
> Hi. I'm a SIlver 1 Mid main. I see that your teams don't have a mid role open, but if you're willing to form another team, i'd def be interested 
> 
> Also, no one wants to be a sub. They look for teams cause they want to play, not wait to play (imo)

Most likely will open up another team due to the fact that we're getting multiple request. I agree as well but then again it's being part of a team that counts lets just say your work schedule is messed up or you got college to deal with and such and even military.

To all applicants, since we're receive many request even some of them aren't commenting. Please know that this is tryouts, you're not {{champion:86}}teed a spot unless specify. Just take this is a recruitment page, as a Manager I'm not allowed to recruit for the team members but advertise. But I will recruit subs and 4 coaches for both teams.

Im a toplane main
I can join either team 
IGN: EaxTheHunted

Hello, I am interested in joining GA Obsidian under the jungler position. I am currently Silver V, I have climbed from Bronze IV and I am still trying to climb.   I currently have a positive win rate in ranked of 52%. My strengths include good decision making, positivity and taking advice on improving really well. I would say a weakness I have is my ability to carry games. I have previously been a support main and have more of a supportive mentality and try to get my teammates fed instead of me. It is something I have been working on.

I play quite a few junglers, mostly tanky supportive types, such as: Nautilus, Sejuani, Amumu, Rammus, Skarner, Warwick, Malphite and Tahm Kench. 

But I am also pretty good with a few more damaging types such as: Diana, Jax, Wukong, Quinn, Xin Zhao, Hecarim, Evelynn, Trundle and Malzahar.

Whatever the team comp requires I can be flexible in that sense.


Overall, I am a good team player. Dedicated and loyal, only wanting to play and get better to climb higher, and I only want the same in return from my teammates.


Thank you for your consideration.


http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Xerces11

Not quite interested myself, but I would like to pitch in and say that having ADC as the team captain is rarely a good idea, ADC is a rough and mechanically/focus intensive role. It's extremely hard to play ADC at an effective level while also directing the team and checking to make early/mid game calls.
I would recommend the jungler be team captain, as they are constantly moving and looking around the map and as long as you aren't getting invaded, you don't have to focus too hard on yourself.


Would love to join a diverse team but I'd fall under the smurfing rule when this account hits 30 FeelsBadMan

> [{quoted}](name=FeelsWindMan,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=5ZXhho9V,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-24T08:56:30.319+0000)
